code: import React from'react';import{Paper,Box,Typography}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StatisticCard=_ref=>{let{title,value,icon,color='#1976d2',height=120}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{elevation:2,sx:{height:height,display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',justifyContent:'space-between',borderTop:"4px solid ".concat(color),overflow:'hidden',position:'relative'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{position:'absolute',right:-10,top:-10,opacity:0.1,transform:'rotate(-15deg)',fontSize:'100px'},children:icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{p:2,zIndex:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"subtitle2",color:"textSecondary",gutterBottom:true,children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",component:"div",sx:{fontWeight:'bold',color:color},children:value})]})]});};export default StatisticCard;
